title: me.dev
text: A great project to work on in my downtime. I've enjoyed taking a deeper dive into bootstrap, and coming up with some cool design components. I hope to have this on my custom domain soon!

title: highseries
text: Inspired by my work on the CER's transportation report, I created this package as kind of an automated data engineering tool for translating spreadsheet style data into the required format for a JavaScript chart. Very useful for projects with lots of data in various tidy/non-tidy formats.
